name: Hand Drill
desc: 18V Cordless power drill for drilling holes and driving screws.
instructions: Insert the battery into the base. Select your drill bit and tighten the chuck. Adjust the torque setting and use the trigger to start drilling slowly.

name: Tool Box
desc: General purpose kit containing hammer, pliers, screwdrivers, and wrenches.
instructions: Open the latches on the front to access the main compartment. Smaller bits and screws are located in the top organizer trays.

name: Measuring Tape
desc: 25ft heavy-duty locking tape measure.
instructions: Pull the metal tab to extend the tape. Push the thumb lock down to hold the position. Release carefully to let it retract.

name: Dolly
desc: Convertible hand truck for moving heavy boxes or furniture.
instructions: Slide the bottom plate under your load. Tilt the dolly back towards you while keeping your foot on the axle for leverage.

name: Garment Steamer
desc: Portable steamer for removing wrinkles from fabric and upholstery.
instructions: Fill the water tank to the max line. Plug in and wait 30 seconds for steam. Run the nozzle vertically over hung garments.

name: Ironing Set
desc: Includes steam iron and foldable ironing board.
instructions: Unfold the board and lock the legs. Fill iron with water, select heat setting, and wait for indicator light to turn off.

name: Spot Cleaner
desc: Portable carpet and upholstery cleaner for stain removal.

name: Level
desc: 24-inch I-beam spirit level.

name: Extension Cord
desc: 50ft indoor/outdoor heavy-duty power extension cable.

name: Drill Bit Set
desc: Assorted kit including masonry, wood, and metal bits.

name: Safety Glasses
desc: ANSI-rated clear protective eyewear.

name: Sewing Machine
desc: Heavy-duty machine suitable for canvas, denim, and light leather.

name: Vacuum
desc: Industrial wet/dry shop vacuum.

name: Badminton Duo Set
desc: Includes two rackets and a tube of birdies.
instructions: Remove rackets from the sleeve. Don't hit the birdies too hard near walls. Return all birdies to the tube after play.

name: Soccer Ball
desc: Standard size 5 soccer ball.
instructions: Ensure the ball is properly inflated. Use only on soft ground or designated pitches. Wipe clean if used in mud.

name: Spikeball Set
desc: Standard roundnet kit with net, frame, and 3 balls.
instructions: Assemble the yellow rim and attach the net tightly. Bounce the ball off the net to play. Disassemble carefully to store.

name: Toronto Monopoly
desc: Classic property trading game, Toronto edition.
instructions: Distribute cash and select your tokens. Follow the classic Monopoly rules. Ensure all cards and pieces are returned to the box.

name: Deck of Cards
desc: Standard 52-card deck (Bicycle brand).
instructions: Shuffle and deal. Please count all 52 cards before returning to the pack.

name: Pickleball Duo Set
desc: Two paddles and two outdoor pickleballs.
instructions: Use on designated pickleball courts. Do not use paddles to hit heavy objects. Return balls to the pouch.

name: Painting Easel
desc: Adjustable wooden tripod easel for canvas painting.
instructions: Loosen the wing nuts to adjust the leg height. Secure the canvas between the top and bottom tray clamps.

name: Toronto Puzzle
desc: 1000-piece jigsaw puzzle featuring the Toronto skyline.
instructions: Find a flat surface and start with the edges. Please triple-check you haven't dropped any pieces on the floor.

name: Frisbee
desc: Classic 175g ultimate disc for outdoor play.
instructions: Hold with a firm grip and flick your wrist to throw. Avoid throwing near windows or traffic.

name: Basketball
desc: Indoor/Outdoor composite leather basketball (Size 7).

name: Tripod
desc: Lightweight aluminum camera tripod with phone mount.

name: DSLR Camera
desc: Canon EOS Rebel with 18-55mm lens kit.

name: Billiards Room
desc: Common room with pool table and lounge seating.

name: Theatre
desc: Bookable screening room with projector and surround sound.

name: Yoga Studio
desc: Open floor studio with mirrors and mats provided.

name: Meeting Room
desc: Quiet workspace with whiteboard and conference table.

name: Barbeque
desc: Outdoor gas grill station located on the patio.

name: Rooftop Terrace
desc: Open air rooftop space with dining tables and view.
